page.title: 17CHILD'S WEEKEND IN WILMCOTE
page.content: After school I{ride home}& on the way I pass the Church,Post Office, Mary Ardens Home,Masons Arms and a garage. After playing out I go home and have tea.After tea I go to{Scouts}in Bearley and Snitterfield, I come back and go to bed. The next day Charles sometimes calls for me to invite me to{Ragley Hall.} When we come back I go home for tea. After tea I go with my dad when he takes my mum to work. On Sunday I have breakfast and go out to play.When I come home for dinner we go to the{Working Mens Club in Wilmcote for a drink. In the afternoon I do some{gardening with my dad until tea.After tea I play {cricket}and then go to bed.
